title: Qatar says it will not tolerate ‘reckless Israeli behaviour’ amid global condemnation of Doha strike – Middle East crisis live
summary: Qatar condemned a recent attack as a "serious escalation," highlighting concerns that it undermines ceasefire negotiations in Gaza. World leaders echoed this sentiment, warning that the strike jeopardizes peace efforts. Hamas reported that six individuals lost their lives in the incident.

title: Apple debuts thinner, $999 iPhone Air at ‘awe-dropping’ annual product event
summary: Apple has enhanced its AirPods with live translation capabilities and announced upgrades for the Apple Watch. The updates aim to improve user experience and functionality across both devices. These innovations showcase Apple's commitment to integrating advanced technology into its product lineup.

title: White House denies that Trump wrote Epstein letter and calls investigation a Democrat ‘hoax’ – live
summary: The White House press secretary has refuted claims that President Biden sent a card to Jeffrey Epstein for his 50th birthday, which purportedly featured an outline of a woman's body. The denial comes in response to allegations circulating about a connection between Biden and the convicted sex offender. The administration emphasized that these accusations are false.

title: Serbia v England: World Cup 2026 qualifying Group K – live
summary: Thomas Tuchel's team aims to uphold their perfect record in Group K. A minute-by-minute report updates fans on the match's progress. Rob Smyth covers the action as the game unfolds.
